title: Looking for duoQ partner - Bronze
body:
Hello everyone!

As the season has just ended I feel like there is no more pressure for me to play soloQ. Would love to duo with someone who is currently bronze/silver.

I am currently in Bronze 2
Prefer to use skype if not that is fine! :)

replies.body:
I'm in, good practice for next season, if you don't mind someone whose performance is all over the place :p 
~PlebsUnited
